thread.title: J.Lo and designer Giuseppe Zanotti are coming out with the most luxurious shoe line
thread.title_full: J.Lo and designer Giuseppe Zanotti are coming out with the most luxurious shoe line

author: Bronwyn Isaac
title: J.Lo and designer Giuseppe Zanotti are coming out with the most luxurious shoe line
text:
J.Lo and designer Giuseppe Zanotti are coming out with the most luxurious shoe line If you are feeling overwhelmed by the state of the world, you can take a momentary refuge in the fact that J. Lo is collaborating with Giuseppe Zanotti on a luxurious shoe line that will transport you to a place full of free, wild stallions and flowing wine.
Calling her prolific would be a grave understatement, so when Jennifer Lopez first shared on Instagram about her upcoming collaboration with the famous designer Giuseppe Zanotti we were eager to see what designs the two would think up. But now, as we are edging closer to the release date, January 23rd, theyâ€™ve given us a fresh taste of the new, ultra-glam line.
Their designs will primarily focus on cage sandals and glamorous glitter encrusted booties that will prepare you for the red carpets in your life. Designing Duo: @jlo and #GiuseppeZanotti are teaming up on an exclusive new footwear collection. Featuring cage sandals and crystal embellished booties, #GiuseppexJennifer goes live January 23. 
A photo posted by Giuseppe Zanotti Design (@giuseppezanottidesign) on Jan 11, 2017 at 9:03am PST 
As you can see, the designs are fully audacious in their use of tiny jewels. This feels like a show Mariah Carey would trounce around in while lounging at home.
Glitterati: Up close with the LYNDA, part of the new #GiuseppexJennifer collection. Co-designed by @jlo and #GiuseppeZanotti, the exclusive line launches in two weeks. 
A photo posted by Giuseppe Zanotti Design (@giuseppezanottidesign) on Jan 10, 2017 at 12:06pm PST 
With less than two weeks until their release, J.Lo and Giuseppe have likely been hard at work crafting the finishing touches on the line. BTS. #GiuseppeXJennifer Launching January 23rd. @giuseppezanottidesign 
A video posted by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) on Jan 10, 2017 at 5:43pm PST 
We are now completely curious to see what they come out with in the next few weeks.
